content:
Hello! I'm excited to be your YouTube scriptwriter for this 10-minute long video on the top 10 most nutritious fruits in the world and their health benefits.

INT. KITCHEN - DAY

A person is seen in the kitchen, looking for something to eat. They open the fridge, but nothing looks appealing. Suddenly, a voice over is heard.

NARRATOR (V.O.)
Are you tired of eating the same old fruits every day? Do you want to know which fruits pack the most nutritional punch? Look no further!

The person closes the fridge and turns to the camera with a look of curiosity.

NARRATOR (V.O.)
In this video, we're counting down the top 10 most nutritious fruits in the world and their health benefits. And don't worry, we'll also be discussing their availability and market prices so you can add them to your grocery list. But first, let's start with a fun fact. Did you know that the avocado is technically a fruit?

The person nods in surprise.

NARRATOR (V.O.)
That's right! Now let's get started with number 10. At number 10 we have the humble blueberry. Not only are they delicious, but they're also packed with antioxidants and vitamins. They're readily available in most grocery stores and can usually be found at a reasonable price.

The person is seen holding a carton of blueberries and smiling.

NARRATOR (V.O.)
Moving on to number 9, we have the pomegranate. These little red gems are packed
